Rule.Name: Use appropriate Namespaces
Rule.Resolution: Change the Namespace '{0}'. Namespaces should not contain "Utils" or "Utilities", such namespaces become buckets for miscellaneous code, place the objects into a relevant Namespace.

Change the Namespace '{0}'. Static Helper classes should be avoided. Attach static "helper" functions to the relevant Class e.g. "User", do not create a "UserHelper". Therefore "Helpers" Namespaces are unnecessary.
Change the Namespace '{0}'. Avoid "Common" Namespaces. The logical shared Namespace (or "common" Namespace) for "Acme.PetShop.Foo" and "Acme.PetShop.Bar" is "Acme.PetShop".

Rule.Name: Use appropriate Class names
Rule.Description: Class names should not be (or contain) "Utils", "Utilities" or "Helper". A Class name should relate to it's responsibility.
Rule.Resolution: Give the Class '{0}' a name relevant to its purpose. Reconsider your object model if appropriate.
Reconsider the Class named '{0}'. Attach static "helper" functions to the relevant Class e.g. "User", do not create a "UserHelper".

Rule.Name: Use appropriate Test Method names
Rule.Description: Test Method names should start with either "IntegrationTest" or "UnitTest" to indicate its purpose.
Rule.Resolution: Prefix the Test Method name with "IntegrationTest" or "UnitTest".
